member.name: M:Automata_DTaylor_FinancialAPI.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.summary: Adds a bank account.

The type of the account. See models tab for option list.
How much money the account contained at inception.
The app will send notifications once the current balance meets or falls below this value.
Set to the same number as the starting balance at inception.

FK for the associated budget category item.
The ID of the user that created the transaction. Character limit of 128.

The time and date of the transaction.
Whether the transaction has been adjusted. Default to false.
The time and date of the transaction adjustment.
